title: Banks complain e-crooks using their names to dupe customers
description: Banks raise alarms over fraudulent entities impersonating them in text messages to dupe customers. They seek intervention from the finance ministry, TRAI, and telecom service providers, and plan to approach the RBI to address compliance challenges with cybersecurity advisories.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
cleaned_content: you can now subscribe to our economic times whatsapp channel
